publicationStmt.publisher: In fletestrete in the house of Thomas Berthelet, nere to the condite at the sygne of Lucrece,

notesStmt.note: ".. compyled sometyme by mayster Fitz herbarde .." (N2v), i.e. John Fitzherbert. Sometimes also attributed to Sir Anthony Fitzherbert.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
This edition has woodcut title-page border McKerrow & Ferguson 30, with "1534" in sill.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the house of Thomas Berthelet, nere to the condite at the sygne of Lucrece
